snippet.title: Unavowed launch trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PC and Mac on August 8th, 2018! http://www.unavowed-game.com

A demon has possessed you and used your body to tear a swath of bloodshed through New York. You are now free, but life as you knew it is over. Your only path forward is joining the Unavowed - an ancient society dedicated to stopping evil. No matter what the cost.

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/336140/Unavowed/

Developed and published by Wadjet Eye Games
Trailer voiceover: Frank Todaro, Sandra Espinoza and SungWon Cho
Trailer music by: Thomas Regin
